subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: With 29 seconds left in the N.B.A. season, Dirk Nowitzki drove past LeBron James for a layup that brought a blissful Dallas bench to its feet.
snippet: With 29 seconds left in the N.B.A. season, Dirk Nowitzki drove past LeBron James for a layup that brought a blissful Dallas bench to its feet.
